description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Doc Logic is a retro styled 2D survival-platformer. Enemies and traps will try to slow you down, but the only thing that can lead to a “game over” screen is the clock reaching zero. Doc Logic contains 8 unique different stages that offer a change in gameplay, and features music from 8 Bit Weapon.
